translations: n.（东罗马帝国的）总督；（东正教的）主教

phrs.translation: 西凡那斯的不结盟神使

sentences.sentence: The primitive exarch and diarch haplostele with cross-like metaxylem exists in the lower part of CNZ.
sentences.translation: 在子叶节区下部存在原始的外始式二原型十字形单中柱。

sentences.sentence: Exarch powers enhance his shooting - Fast Shot and Crack Shot which remain unchanged in their rules from the previous codex.
sentences.translation: 军官灵能会加强他自己的射击能力，快速射击与出色枪法能力不变。

sentences.sentence: Crack Shot - any enemy the Exarch is shooting at may not make any cover saves and he may reroll any to wound rolls when shooting.
sentences.translation: 出色枪法-军官射击的目标不具有掩蔽物保护，可重掷失败的损伤。
